description: Up for sale is a 1986 Bentley Mulsanne L (long edition) from 10 feet away the car looks absolutely beautiful. When you get close you can see the little spider cracks in the paint and the paint on the drivers side door is fading a little, but like I said from 10 feet away you will not notice it. Interior is mint, runs like a dream.
title: 1986 Bentley Mulsanne

description: For sale in our Nashville showroom is a 1956 Bentley S1 Saloon, or as I like to say, pure class! Powering this beautiful Bentley S1 Saloon for sale is a stretched 4887 Cubic Centimeter Inline 6 cylinder; letÃ¢??s put that another way how about a 4.9L Inline 6 Cylinder, thatÃ¢??s better. This Bentley for sale has all of the power that you will need to pass the driver in the slow lane, all while you are cruising down the road. Backing this 4.9L I6 is a 4 speed Automatic Transmission, with itÃ¢??s smooth shifts and ease of pedal youÃ¢??re shifting will match your style Ã¢??SmoothÃ¢?Â. This Bentley for sale is a symbol of success and whether you sit on the front seat or stretch your legs in the rear of this spacious cabin, you cannot help but feel important. Heads turn as everyone tries to figure out what famous person is hiding in the back as you float by. Being a right hand drive car it will be very easy to slide up to the BMW at a stop light in the right lane and ask the drive if he has any grey poupon? With yards and yards or light grey leather adorning the seats that have maroon piping to match the exterior color scheme of the car and enough burl wood to build a very pretty battle ship the interior of this car is as comfortable as your living room.  If you are looking for a car to use as a limo or just looking to have the most elegant car at your local car show, you will not do better than this car. Options for this Bentley for sale include: power brakes, Leather interior, burl wood serving trays, seat belts and white wall tires. For more information call us at 615-213-1800 or email us at nashville@gatewayclassiccars.com

description: This Bentley has been religiously maintained by a reputable Palm Beach Art Collector. Service Records ( available with Rolls Royce or Bentley Grill ) He has owned her for 8 years, He gave us all the receipts for any work that has been done over that time. The conversion to the 350 Chevrolet Engine, Jaguar Front and Rear Suspension and Brakes was done . The odometer stopped at 85,000 miles. She starts right up, she has had a new carburetor installed and all tuned up. Her large white wall tires show off a great look........ She has driven her about 10,000 miles during her ownership her beauty and the after market A/C blows ice cold and strong. Power windows, right hand drive. Wipers, horn and lights, blinker lights all work. This rolling work of art, Bentley S 3 is so easy to maintain! Any certified mechanic can easily access her 350 cubic inch Chevrolet Engine. All the fun of a Bentley/Rolls Royce without the $5000.00 brake job! Great paint, chrome and body............

description: This 1955 Bentley R Type Saloon is in white with grey leather.
A right hand drive example.

Just over 2300 hand built R Type’s were produced over a three year period. This car being produced towards the end of that time meant that it had some of the improvements the car received as production progressed.

Powered by a 4566 cc Rolls Royce 6 cylinder, overhead inlet, side exhaust valve and twin SU carburetors. A  General Motors-sourced Hydra-Matic automatic gearbox, which was the first time an auto ‘box had been fitted to a Bentley, was a very welcome option.
This R Type has been in the same ownership since 1985!  Always serviced and maintained here locally.
Prior engine rebuild by A Spranza Motors in the 1990's.
Paint is showing signs of its age but overall presentable. Some grazing and chips.  Even consistency on color.
Factory sunroof.
Interior leather shows some patina but is still supple. Wood is in nice condition and shows well. Gauges are in good working order. Nice headliner, door panels and carpets.
Recent service performed in July 2015 at 100,234:
- Replaced valve cover gaskets, side cover gaskets and checked valve clearances.
- Mounted and balanced 4 new tires.
- Repaired faulty fuel tank sending unit.
- Installed new Voltage Regulator.
- Lube oil and minor tune up
Total spend $3,456.08
Ready to enjoy.
All inspections welcome. We ship worldwide.
Contact us at 831.905.3909 day or evening.
